text: Gamma Crucis, also known as Gacrux, is the closest M-type red giant star to the Sun. It is only visible in the southern hemisphere. It has a diameter 120 times larger than the Sun and lies in the Crux constellation.https://arxiv.org/abs/1811.10679 == References == ==Sources== GACRUX by Jim Kaler Category:Red giants Category:Stars
title: Gamma Crucis
